body_html:
Hi @immars
User can use MonitoredSession directly instead of MonitoredTrainingSession. Please document in your hook, how should they use it and give an example of usage with MonitoredSession.
Having another MonitoredTrainingSession inside contrib will confuse users.
body_text:
Hi @immars
User can use MonitoredSession directly instead of MonitoredTrainingSession. Please document in your hook, how should they use it and give an example of usage with MonitoredSession.
Having another MonitoredTrainingSession inside contrib will confuse users.
body:
Hi @immars
User can use `MonitoredSession` directly instead of `MonitoredTrainingSession`. Please document in your hook, how should they use it and give an example of usage with `MonitoredSession`.
Having another `MonitoredTrainingSession` inside contrib will confuse users.
